attributes.action: To reverse the decision to sack Professor David Nutt the UK's chief drugs adviser
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I ask Gordon Brown to reverse the decision of home secretary Alan Johnson to sack Professor David Nutt the UK's chief drugs adviser.
The UK's chief drugs adviser should be allowed to argue the intellectual argue without fear of political persecution.
Drug laws should be based on fact and harm not political point scoring.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
